Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are promising devices for energy conversion applications due to their high electrical efficiency and eco-friendly behavior.
Titulo: Impregnation of gadolinium-doped ceria backbone electrodes modified by addition of pore-formers for SOFC application

Sentencas: Nowadays, commercial SOFCs are electrically efficient at high operating temperatures, typically between 800 and 1000 & DEG;C. This high-temperature range restricts not only their real-life applications but also their lifetime.
Titulo: Impregnation of gadolinium-doped ceria backbone electrodes modified by addition of pore-formers for SOFC application

Sentencas: Our basic goal deals with the objective to reduce the operating temperature by working in the range from 500 to 700 ?.
Titulo: Impregnation of gadolinium-doped ceria backbone electrodes modified by addition of pore-formers for SOFC application

Sentencas: Among SOFCs, metal-supported intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (MS-IT-SOFCs) may provide very cheap SOFCs with increased lifetime and reduced operating temperature.
Titulo: Impregnation of gadolinium-doped ceria backbone electrodes modified by addition of pore-formers for SOFC application

Sentencas: In view of developing highly efficient electrodes, this work focuses on the physical and electrical characterizations of porous GDC backbones which have been impregnated with LSCF sol-gel solutions and NiO solutions, for composite cathodes and anodes, respectively.
Titulo: Impregnation of gadolinium-doped ceria backbone electrodes modified by addition of pore-formers for SOFC application

Sentencas: The porosity of the backbone was controlled by the addition of different pore-formers.
Titulo: Impregnation of gadolinium-doped ceria backbone electrodes modified by addition of pore-formers for SOFC application

Sentencas: The performance of 8 different samples was compared by studying the evolution of the electrical resistivity in function of temperature.
Titulo: Impregnation of gadolinium-doped ceria backbone electrodes modified by addition of pore-formers for SOFC application

Sentencas: An important effect has been demonstrated: whatever the temperature, from 500 to 700 ?, the resistivity can be tuned both by the solution viscosity and by the kind of pore-former.
Titulo: Impregnation of gadolinium-doped ceria backbone electrodes modified by addition of pore-formers for SOFC application
